author: Pamela Muse
text:
Looking for copies of your staff capacity studies for Community Development, specifically development processing such as Planning and permits.
Also, did you do the capacity study in house or used a consultant would be helpful too.
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director

title: Community Development Staff Capacity Study
